slide.title: What's next?
slide.blurb: The next TODO (after cleanups) is definetly OO support, although this will most likely be implemented for PHP 5 extensions only. Currently extensions generated by PECL_Gen work with both PHP 4 and 5, but unlike the rest of the extension API the OO related parts of it have undergone some substantial changes.
PECL_Gen can also be used as base for other code generators. A first example showing its capabilities in this realm is UDF_Gen, a code generator for MySQL User Defined Function libraries.
Extensions that have been created using PECL_Gen include PECLS %html_parse% and %mdb_tools%. So although still not finished PECL_Gen is already perfectly capable of doing 'real work' :)
